title: Do you support the Illuminati? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not support the Illuminati or even the idea that there is an Illuminati. It’s paranoid superstition and fear that drives that kind of thinking, but, ok, supposing I DO want to support the Illuminati, who do I make out the check to?
The Illuminati control everything, so whatever I do obviously supports their secret domination of the world.
